item.title: Money That is Quickly Gained is Quickly Lost, Payroll Psychology, and Consumerism
item.author: brandon@tacticaltypos.net (Brandon Hall)
item.description: Summary: In this post, I present a hypothetical error that humans may make when they receive their monthly or bi-weekly paychecks and explore how the error might help the economy but cause workers to suffer.
